Articles.Content:
I would be really interested in a mod that adds more atmospheric effects, like shock cones, vapor clouds from high G turns, and wingtip trails.

Shock Cone example:

For the High G turn vapor clouds, watch this video (Title says shock cone, but its mostly vapor clouds from turning. Uploader mistake)

As for wingtip trails, I'm sure most of you have seen them. They occur on many jets and stunt planes while turning hard.

The stock effects could be tweaked to appear on the top of the plane during a high G turn to act as vapor clouds, although bigger ones like in the video would be really cool.

Anyone else interested? Anyone wanna make it?
nobody? I'm very interested in this idea but I can't mod.
